room_title: Escape room "Nixon's Watergate" by Blue Ops Mission in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Watergate was amazing fun and a great team-building opportunity for my coworkers and I. We were challenged and entertained by the escape room we chose. The hour went by SO quickly!

room_title: Escape room "Nixon's Watergate" by Blue Ops Mission in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: 15 of us from work did the Watergate room. It was a blast trying to figure out the clues. We were talking about the experience the next day. I highly recommend this as a team building exercise. They have done a great job designing the rooms and puzzles.
